subject: Hello
body:
Hello
We are currently in search of an International Business Representative, contact us for details if interested:
Yours truly,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
FCP Management and Consulting Ltd.

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm intrigued by your proposal and would love to learn more about this business opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What kind of business are we talking about here? And what would be my role in it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello  Joan,

I have read your mail, and I think I have a brief insight of the project.

I work with a United states elite group with an asset management team in
the United Kingdom. They announced their interest in last August to start
sponsoring valuable investment projects from any sector.

I have been working with consultants from Eastern Europe, Middle East and
few states in the USA but we have not found a suitable projects to confirm
the interest with my team.

I figured this would be a good point of discussion with the integral
partners.

I am anticipating your response, hence my interest is piqued, and I and my
team have declared interest to place the $80 million on the project for 15
to 20 years as a JVC with the expectation of 10% as ROI.

I need you to answer these few questions so I can share more information
with him.

Are you the principal project owner/manager?

Are you able to travel to meet in person on a round table to finalize the
closing?

Let me know your thoughts and feel free to ask any questions.

Yours respectfully,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

FCP MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING LTD
SUTTON LANE,CITY HOUNSLOW,
ZIP CODE: TW3 3BB
UNITED KINGDOM
Tel No:+44 7452 113102
WhatsApp:+44 7706 881596
E-mail: fabiocamposde@gmail.com
Email: info@fcpconsult.uk
Email: enquiry@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fabiodecampos@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fcp.consulting@fcpconsult.uk
Website: https://www.fcpconsult.uk

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your response and the interest in my project. It's great to hear that your team is considering investing in various sectors. I'm sure we can find a common ground for our interests.

To answer your questions, yes, I am the principal project owner and manager. As for traveling, it would depend on the current situation with travel restrictions due to the pandemic. However, I am open to virtual meetings or any other form of communication that suits us both.

Could you please share more details about what kind of projects your team is interested in? Also, could you elaborate on what you mean by JVC and ROI?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello  Joan,

Well, we are happy to work with you, and hopefully, we can work together
longer than the investment term. And I also would want you have in mind
that our decisions are collectively deliberated and absolutely have got no
hidden intentions.

JVC simply means joint venture, while ROI means abbreviation for return on
investment, the amount of interest or profit you earns on the projects.

We intend to build Academies which shall accommodate several workshops and
also open up business empires that shall involve these group people our
hearts are going out for. We shall rely on your experience and expertise
for these investments around the world

We are deliberating on your physical visit to a zoned office in Belgium
Brussels) where funds presently are to sign off the fund to your bonafide
choice destination.

Please do throw more light with regards to your projects which you would
want to Inventure into, and what level of success you will achieve and the
amount you will be needing to achieve this goal.

Yours respectfully,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

FCP MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING LTD
SUTTON LANE,CITY HOUNSLOW,
ZIP CODE: TW3 3BB
UNITED KINGDOM
Tel No:+44 7452 113102
WhatsApp:+44 7706 881596
E-mail: fabiocamposde@gmail.com
Email: info@fcpconsult.uk
Email: enquiry@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fabiodecampos@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fcp.consulting@fcpconsult.uk
Website: https://www.fcpconsult.uk

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear about the joint venture and return on investment opportunities with FCP Management and Consulting Ltd. The idea of building academies and business empires sounds very promising.

I'm curious, could you tell me more about these workshops that will be part of the academies? What kind of topics or skills will they cover?

Also, I'm intrigued by the physical visit to the zoned office in Belgium Brussels. Could you provide more details about what this visit would entail?

As for my projects, I have a few ideas in mind but I'd like to understand more about your company's areas of expertise and interest before I share them. Could you tell me more about the types of projects FCP Management and Consulting Ltd has been involved with in the past?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Joan,

After going through your elaborate explanation, we have come to the
conclusion that we want this with you, the partners have agreed and
accepted your proposal in the sectors of your projects.

What this means is that we are signing a Joint Working Agreement with you
for any amount that is needed for the project with the expectation of an
annual ROI of 10% for a term of 15 years with a grace period of 365 days.

It left for you to know how to coordinates your projects founders. you may
want to distribute the funding to them using your own discretion. We do not
want to get involved in all of those since. We are not interested in
reaping all of the commercial loan and the interests as you have "thought
aloud" in suggestion of a best possible way to reap.

The Fund covered by this agreement shall be used for Project and Managed
for 15Years Duration: (I.E)  (Party B) will manage and Invest the funds for
a time duration of 15 Years and the Profit of this Investment / Project
will be shared 10% for (Party A) and 90% For (Party B) respectively this
will be subject for review after 365 days or Yearly review.

The funds are presently secured and shall be paid out to you either
directly from my bank in USA, Spain or Belgium, The fund shall be released
to you as non-recourse loan. This is just to defend and protect the funds
in your custody and justifies it for the investments. The funds can be
shared among your accounts within the nations as mentioned. Therefore the
closing visit shall be in Spain or Belgium.

I am hopeful that the above explanation could be understood at this point,

Confirm your understanding of the above to enable me put together an MOU
for counter signs that shall describe our position so we can joyfully
proceed into this noble partnership.

Looking forward to your cooperation

Yours respectfully,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

FCP MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING LTD
SUTTON LANE,CITY HOUNSLOW,
ZIP CODE: TW3 3BB
UNITED KINGDOM
Tel No:+44 7452 113102
WhatsApp:+44 7706 881596
E-mail: fabiocamposde@gmail.com
Email: info@fcpconsult.uk
Email: enquiry@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fabiodecampos@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fcp.consulting@fcpconsult.uk
Website: https://www.fcpconsult.uk

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your detailed response. I'm thrilled to hear that the partners have agreed and accepted my proposal. It's great news that we're moving forward with a Joint Working Agreement.

I understand that the funding will be used for the project and managed for a duration of years, with profits shared between both parties. This is indeed an exciting venture.

However, I do have a few questions to ensure I fully understand our agreement:

1. Could you please clarify the exact amount needed for the project?
2. What is the expected annual ROI?
3. How long is the grace period?
4. Could you provide more details about how the funds will be distributed?

I also want to confirm that any closing visit would need to take place in Spain or Belgium, as mentioned in your message.

Once these points are clarified, I'll be more than happy to proceed further into this noble venture.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Joan,

1. Could you please clarify the exact amount needed for the project?
Like told you already I and my team have declared interest to place the $80
million on any profitable project. But it depends on the the amount you
will be needing to invest in the project.

2. What is the expected annual ROI?
365 days or Yearly review
Like i mentioned to you previously the ROI is %10

3. How long is the grace period?
From 10/15 to 20 years it depends on how long your project will last.

4. Could you provide more details about how the funds will be distributed?
You will receive the investment amount in various installments by wire
transfer MT103 after the signing of the agreement.

I also want to confirm that any closing visit would need to take place in
Spain or Belgium, as mentioned in your message.
YES.

Best regards,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

FCP MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING LTD
SUTTON LANE,CITY HOUNSLOW,
ZIP CODE: TW3 3BB
UNITED KINGDOM
Tel No:+44 7452 113102
WhatsApp:+44 7706 881596
E-mail: fabiocamposde@gmail.com
Email: info@fcpconsult.uk
Email: enquiry@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fabiodecampos@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fcp.consulting@fcpconsult.uk
Website: https://www.fcpconsult.uk

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time you've taken to explain things to me.

I'm still a bit unclear about the exact amount needed for the project. Could you please provide a more specific figure? 

Also, regarding the expected annual ROI, could you give me an estimate or range? I understand it might vary, but having a ballpark figure would be helpful.

As for the grace period, is there any flexibility in terms of duration? Would it be possible to negotiate this based on the progress of the project?

Lastly, concerning the fund transfer process, could you elaborate on how this will work after signing the agreement? Will there be any additional fees or charges involved?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Joan,

I'm still a bit unclear about the exact amount needed for the project.
Could you please provide a more specific figure?
I have mentioned this to you several time, that I and my team have declared
interest to place the $80 million

Also, regarding the expected annual ROI, could you give me an estimate or
range? I understand it might vary, but having a ballpark figure would be
helpful.
No,I cannot give you an estimated range, because ROI is calculated by
subtracting the initial cost of the investment from its final value, then
dividing this new number by the cost of the investment


As for the grace period, is there any flexibility in terms of duration?
Would it be possible to negotiate this based on the progress of the project?
Yes, it can be negotiable based on the progress of the project.

Lastly, concerning the fund transfer process, could you elaborate on how
this will work after signing the agreement? Will there be any additional
fees or charges involved?
Normally we usually meet on a round table on the day of close with the
bank, and after we must have countersign our MOU there will be a
registration of an accreditation in your name, having you officially
recognize of your status being qualified to handle this investment funding,
which will be handle by an agent/attorney that will make the registering of
an accreditation, notary in your name to ensure that you are fit legally to
receive such funds in the global financial watch, and also agreement will
be registered with Economic and Financial Affairs (DG ECFIN), Brussels
Court of Commerce . European Chambers and Commerce, thereafter my bank in
Brussels Belgium, Spain or Federal reserve bank United States of America
will make direct wire transfer to your designated bank account.

The financial obligation required to perform in order to facilitate the
registration you and i shall jointly shoulder equal responsibility of the
financial obligations

Looking forward to your clear understanding and cooperation

Best regards,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

FCP MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING LTD
SUTTON LANE,CITY HOUNSLOW,
ZIP CODE: TW3 3BB
UNITED KINGDOM
Tel No:+44 7452 113102
WhatsApp:+44 7706 881596
E-mail: fabiocamposde@gmail.com
Email: info@fcpconsult.uk
Email: enquiry@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fabiodecampos@fcpconsult.uk
Email: fcp.consulting@fcpconsult.uk
Website: https://www.fcpconsult.uk

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time you've taken to explain the process to me.

I'm still a bit unclear about the exact amount needed for the project. Could you please provide a more specific figure? I understand that ROI is calculated by subtracting the initial cost of the investment from its final value, then dividing this new number by the cost of the investment, but having a ballpark figure would be helpful.

It's good to know that the grace period can be negotiable based on the progress of the project. That seems fair and reasonable.

Regarding fund transfer, it sounds like there are quite a few steps involved after signing the agreement. Just to clarify, will there be any additional fees or charges involved in this process? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Joan,

ROI is calculated according to your investment profit, i have explained
this to you already, i cannot make any calculation on a project that you
have not yet started.

Like i mentioned to you in my previous mail, there will be a registration
of an accreditation in your name, having you officially recognize of your
status being qualified to handle this investment funding, which will be
handle by an agent/lawyer that will make the registering of an
accreditation, notary in your name to ensure that you are fit legally to
receive such funds in the global financial watch, The fees/ The financial
obligation required to perform in order to facilitate the registration you
and i shall jointly shoulder equal responsibility of the financial
obligations.

I believe you have closed several projects in the past, and you are very
much aware of what I am talking about.

Best regards,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

FCP MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING LTD

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm still trying to wrap my head around some of the concepts you've mentioned. Could you perhaps simplify it a bit for me? 

You mentioned something about an agent lawyer handling the notary in my name, could you explain more about this process? And what exactly does this financial obligation entail?

I appreciate your patience with me as I try to understand all of this.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Joan,

The agent/lawyer that will make the registration of an accreditation,
notary in your name to ensure that you are fit legally to receive such
funds in the global financial watch,  will be paid for his services,
financial obligation simply means payment to the agent.

Best regards,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your email. It's great to hear from you! I'm intrigued by the process you've outlined, especially the part about a lawyer making a notary in my name. Could you please explain more about how this works? Also, what kind of services will the agent provide?

I'm also curious about the payment for these services. How is it usually handled? Is there an upfront fee or is it deducted from the funds I am to receive?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Joan,

I don't know why you are making things so difficult to understand, I cannot
explain more than what i have told you already. I will advise you to go
through all my mails and read them again for your better understanding.

For your information, deducted from the funds won't be possible, until all
registration in your name is fully done properly with Economic and
Financial Affairs (DG ECFIN), Brussels  Court of Commerce . European
Chambers and Commerce, ICC Court and Financial Regulatory Department
located in Brussels and this Process will be handled by the Financial
Officer and Resident Attorney.

Therefore, there will be an upfront fee to enable the agent make all
necessary registration in your name.

Best regards,
Fabio De Campos Padilha
Director.

FCP MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING LTD
SUTTON LANE,CITY HOUNSLOW,
ZIP CODE: TW3 3BB
UNITED KINGDOM

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Fabio,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must admit, some of the terms and processes you mentioned are a bit over my head. Could you perhaps break it down a bit more for me? 

For instance, what exactly does the upfront fee cover? And could you tell me more about the role of the Financial Officer and Resident Attorney in this process?

I'm just trying to understand everything clearly before we proceed further.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Joan

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Joan,

The fee will cover the registration of an Accreditation expenses in your
name, notary and professional services fees.

The job of the attorney is to make registration of the Accreditation etc.
get it clear .

Fabio

subject: Re: Hello
body:
